EmailTemplate.name: 12DecWeb-ACA.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, webinar on how Obamacare affects self-employed professionals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on Thursday, December 12 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Affordable Care Act: What Independent Workers Need to Know <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>."
With all the news stories and media confusion relating to the new Affordable Care Act, it's easy for independent consultants to get lost in the shuffle. That's why MBO CEO Gene Zaino and VP of Business Development Dave Putt are cutting through the noise in MBO's next webinar. Learn how the new policies affect you and your solo business, and have your ACA questions answered by the experts. Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
